IBRAHIMOVIC KEEN ON REAL DEAL

Zlatan Ibrahimovic is keen on moving to Real Madrid following his release by Manchester United, according to Diario Gol.

However, Real are concerned about the prospect of adding a personality to the squad which could disrupt the harmony within the dressing room.

Ibrahimovic is currently recovering from a knee injury sustained towards the end of last season and has also been linked with a move to Major League Soccer.
